abstract: After a day of confusion, Mr. Romney issues a clarification.
snippet: After a day of confusion, Mr. Romney issues a clarification.
lead_paragraph: FAIRFAX, Va. -- Mitt Romney on Wednesday reaffirmed his support for efforts to crack down on unions in Ohio, apologizing for causing "confusion" by appearing to waffle on the issue in that state a day earlier.

headline.main: Yes, Mitt Romney Backs Efforts to Limit Unions in Ohio
